# Setting Up Online Booking For A Wordpress Website

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/setting-up-online-booking-for-a-wordpress-website/

## Category
13 Online Booking

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
ONLINE BOOKING
ONLINE BOOKING SETUP GUIDES
Adding Online Booking to a WordPress Website

This article covers how to integrate online booking with your WordPress website.

The Mangomint team is available to set up your online booking integration for you for free. Please contact us and we'll complete the integration for you.

If you would like to complete the integration yourself, follow the steps in this article. If you need help or have any questions, please reach out to chat support.

Link copied
Integrating online booking with your WordPress website

To integrate online booking with your WordPress website, open the Settings app and select Online Booking > Setup & Integration.

Copy your script tag.

In WordPress, go to Plugins > Add New and install the free WPCode Insert Headers and Footers plugin.

Once the WPCode plugin is installed, go to Code Snippets > Header & Footer and paste the script tag in the header section. Click Save Changes.

In Mangomint, copy your online booking link.

Use the link as the URL for any booking buttons/links on your website to complete the integration.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
